modName: Master Vampires Blood - a vampirism potion
summary: A simple potion that transforms you into a vampire. No more hassling with contracting sanguinare vampiris :)
descriptionHtml:
Description:
The mod is pretty simple. 3 master vampire\'s blood bottles (or \"potions\") have been added to the Riverwood Trader. One costs about 3000 gold, just so things aren\'t too easy :) Just drink one bottle and your vampiric powers will awaken (you can check it under Magic>Active Effects).

Installation:
1. Extract the rar archive
2. Put the MasterVampireBlood.esp into your Data folder
3. Activate the mod using either the launcher (under Data Files) or the Nexus Mod Menager
4. Done!

Bugs:
-None so far, please report in the comments if you find some.
author: Zim8662
